interval.title: Update Interval
interval.description:
Update interval in seconds. Controls how often the integration polls for new data.

Minimum: {min_value}
Maximum: {max_value}
Default: {default_value}
Recommended: {recommended_value} (5 minutes)

Note: Changes require reloading the integration:
1. Save this configuration
2. Go back to Integrations
3. Find Enode integration
4. Click ⋮ (three dots menu)
5. Select "Reload"

Tip: Too frequent updates may cause API rate limiting.

error.invalid_update_interval: Update interval must be between minimum and maximum values
